ingredients.ingredient: 1 (32 ounce) container plain yogurt (such as sheeps' milk yogurt)

cookingTips: Use full-fat yogurt with live cultures for best results
Line the strainer with cheesecloth to catch whey
Let it drain overnight in the refrigerator for thicker cheese
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What makes the difference between creating a thick, spreadable cream cheese and maintaining its tangy flavor?
